title: Group portrait of groom, wearing moustache, dark necktie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, and bride standing, wearing earrings, light colored long sleeved cropped sheer jacket with floral and leaf embroidery, floral and leaf patterned satin wedding dress with belt, and corsage on left shoulder, gathered behind table with floral tablecloth and three tiered wedding cake in interior with light colored wall and door on left, possibly for Frazier Blackwell wedding
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
